extendedInfo.description: âThe Walking Deadâ meets tilt gaming in this insane splatter fest of zombie killing mayhem.When the zombie apocalypse first struck, the residents of Tilt Labyrinth constructed traps to try to kill them, brought out the heavy weapons to try to blow them away, and invented complicated doors and switches to try to confuse them. Nothing worked. Everyone is a zombie now! Everyone except our hero, Rebound. Now Rebound has to escape while fighting hoards of Zombies and navigating through all the failed traps that were left behind. Three Acts of insane zombie killing action. Navigate Rebound through rotating saw blades, meat grinders, shooting spikes, dropping bombs, and numerous other tricks and traps while simultaneously slaughtering the zombie evil. Sixty stupidly hard levels to try to conquer with many more on there way!  Features:* Zombie killing. Lotâs of stupid zombies to slaughter.* All the sprays, splats and flying giblets you can handle.* 3D Graphics!* Six minutes of original music* A rich landscape of sound effects.* Multiple zombie types.* Multiple weapons.* Small Stupidly Hard levels.* Quick to play but hard to beat.* Completing each level is an accomplishment.* Global leader boards featuring zombie kills, player deaths, and, of course, scores.

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: nice game but it needs a suvivle mode more guns and u should be able to make ur own caricter but nice game
reviews.author: Gemma Kent

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: This game has only one act and the other two are paid
reviews.author: Yatin Bhagchandani

reviews.title: It\'s a good start
reviews.comment: Blood and gore :) Overall, it\'s a very good start. Well-balanced levels, quirky gfx and a good tune. If you are into zombies, this title is for you. I\'d love to see more guns and new zombie types.
reviews.author: Tom Mleko

reviews.title: Rolling. Death
reviews.comment: Great game; roll around labyrinths, dodge bone-saws, destroy hordes of zombies with a rocket launcher. What more could you want? Excellent time filler.
reviews.author: Duncan MacKinnon

reviews.title: Force Close on Samsung Galaxy Y
reviews.author: Leandro Berti

reviews.title: Zombie lover
reviews.comment: I love zombies but this is the best one yet
reviews.author: Jeffery Strack
